title: A quarter of humanity faces extreme water stress -- and it's poised to get worse, new report finds
description: The world is facing an "unprecedented water crisis" driven by soaring demand and the accelerating climate crisis, according to a new report.

title: Civil war is worsening Sudan's already dire humanitarian crisis. How you can help
description: After months of deadly fighting, Sudanese refugees are hungry, traumatized, exhausted and in need of aid. Here's what you can do to help the most vulnerable
